Module no.ntnu.idatt1002
Package no.ntnu.idatt1002.dao.sqlite

Class SqlGroupDAO

java.lang.Object
no.ntnu.idatt1002.dao.sqlite.SqlDAO
no.ntnu.idatt1002.dao.sqlite.SqlGroupDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
DAO<Group,Long>, GroupDAO
public final class SqlGroupDAO extends SqlDAO implements GroupDAO
This class is an implementation of the GroupDAO interface, using SQLite as the underlying data source.
